info.title: Cloudflare Pages API
info.description: Extracted Pages-related endpoints from Cloudflare API

get.description: Fetch a list of all user projects.

schema.description: Which page of projects to fetch.
How many projects to return per page.

build_config.description: Configs for the project build process.

build_caching.description: Enable build caching for the project.

deployment_configs.description: Configs for deployments in a project.

production_branch.description: Production branch of the project. Used to identify production deployments.

source.description: Configs for the project source control.

deployments_enabled.description:
Whether to enable automatic deployments when pushing to the source repository.
When disabled, no deployments (production or preview) will be triggered automatically.
deployments_enabled.x-stainless-deprecation-message: Use `production_deployments_enabled` and `preview_deployment_setting` for more granular control.

owner_id.description: The owner ID of the repository.

path_excludes.description: A list of paths that should be excluded from triggering a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported.

path_includes.description: A list of paths that should be watched to trigger a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported.

preview_branch_excludes.description: A list of branches that should not trigger a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported. Must be used with `preview_deployment_setting` set to `custom`.

preview_branch_includes.description: A list of branches that should trigger a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported. Must be used with `preview_deployment_setting` set to `custom`.

preview_deployment_setting.description: Controls whether commits to preview branches trigger a preview deployment.

production_branch.description: The production branch of the repository.

production_deployments_enabled.description: Whether to trigger a production deployment on commits to the production branch.

patch.description: Set new attributes for an existing project. Modify environment variables. To delete an environment variable, set the key to null.

build_config.description: Configs for the project build process.

build_caching.description: Enable build caching for the project.

deployment_configs.description: Configs for deployments in a project.

production_branch.description: Production branch of the project. Used to identify production deployments.

source.description: Configs for the project source control.

deployments_enabled.description:
Whether to enable automatic deployments when pushing to the source repository.
When disabled, no deployments (production or preview) will be triggered automatically.
deployments_enabled.x-stainless-deprecation-message: Use `production_deployments_enabled` and `preview_deployment_setting` for more granular control.

owner_id.description: The owner ID of the repository.

path_excludes.description: A list of paths that should be excluded from triggering a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported.

path_includes.description: A list of paths that should be watched to trigger a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported.

preview_branch_excludes.description: A list of branches that should not trigger a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported. Must be used with `preview_deployment_setting` set to `custom`.

preview_branch_includes.description: A list of branches that should trigger a preview deployment. Wildcard syntax (`*`) is supported. Must be used with `preview_deployment_setting` set to `custom`.

preview_deployment_setting.description: Controls whether commits to preview branches trigger a preview deployment.

production_branch.description: The production branch of the repository.

production_deployments_enabled.description: Whether to trigger a production deployment on commits to the production branch.

get.description: Fetch a list of project deployments.

schema.description: What type of deployments to fetch.
Which page of deployments to fetch.
How many deployments to return per page.

post.description: Start a new deployment from production. The repository and account must have already been authorized on the Cloudflare Pages dashboard.

_headers.description: Headers configuration file for the deployment.

_redirects.description: Redirects configuration file for the deployment.

_routes.json.description: Routes configuration file defining routing rules.

_worker.bundle.description:
Worker bundle file in multipart/form-data format. Mutually exclusive with `_worker.js`.
Cannot specify both `_worker.js` and `_worker.bundle` in the same request.
Maximum size: 25 MiB.

_worker.js.description:
Worker JavaScript file. Mutually exclusive with `_worker.bundle`.
Cannot specify both `_worker.js` and `_worker.bundle` in the same request.

branch.description: The branch to build the new deployment from. The `HEAD` of the branch will be used. If omitted, the production branch will be used by default.

commit_dirty.description: Boolean string indicating if the working directory has uncommitted changes.

commit_hash.description: Git commit SHA associated with this deployment.

commit_message.description: Git commit message associated with this deployment.

manifest.description:
JSON string containing a manifest of files to deploy. Maps file paths to their content hashes.
Required for direct upload deployments. Maximum 20,000 entries.

wrangler_config_hash.description: Hash of the Wrangler configuration file used for this deployment.

get.description: Fetch deployment logs for a project.

post.description: Rollback the production deployment to a previous deployment. You can only rollback to succesful builds on production.

get.description: Fetch a list of all domains associated with a Pages project.

post.description: Add a new domain for the Pages project.

patch.description: Retry the validation status of a single domain.

post.description: Purge all cached build artifacts for a Pages project

delete.description: Deletes all tests for a specific webpage from a specific region. Deleted tests are still counted as part of the quota.

get.description: Test history (list of tests) for a specific webpage.

200.description: List of test history for a page.

post.description: Starts a test for a specific webpage, in a specific region.

get.description: Retrieves the result of a specific test.
Lists the core web vital metrics trend over time for a specific page.

parameters.description: The timezone of the start and end timestamps.
parameters.name: tz

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of metrics to include in the results.
parameters.name: metrics

get.summary: List core web vital metrics trend

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

allOf.description: Most recent production deployment of the project.

deployment_configs.description: Configs for deployments in a project.

domains.description: A list of associated custom domains for the project.

framework_version.description: Version of the framework the project is using.

allOf.description: Most recent deployment of the project.

production_branch.description: Production branch of the project. Used to identify production deployments.

subdomain.description: The Cloudflare subdomain associated with the project.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

aliases.description: A list of alias URLs pointing to this deployment.

deployment_trigger.description: Info about what caused the deployment.

commit_dirty.description: Whether the deployment trigger commit was dirty.

commit_hash.description: Hash of the deployment trigger commit.

commit_message.description: Message of the deployment trigger commit.

is_skipped.description: If the deployment has been skipped.

modified_on.description: When the deployment was last modified.

short_id.description: Short Id (8 character) of the deployment.

url.description: The live URL to view this deployment.

ai_bindings.description: Constellation bindings used for Pages Functions.

always_use_latest_compatibility_date.description: Whether to always use the latest compatibility date for Pages Functions.

analytics_engine_datasets.description: Analytics Engine bindings used for Pages Functions.

browsers.description: Browser bindings used for Pages Functions.

build_image_major_version.description: The major version of the build image to use for Pages Functions.

compatibility_date.description: Compatibility date used for Pages Functions.

compatibility_flags.description: Compatibility flags used for Pages Functions.

d1_databases.description: D1 databases used for Pages Functions.

namespace_id.description: ID of the Durable Object namespace.

durable_object_namespaces.description: Durable Object namespaces used for Pages Functions.

env_vars.description: Environment variables used for builds and Pages Functions.

fail_open.description: Whether to fail open when the deployment config cannot be applied.

hyperdrive_bindings.description: Hyperdrive bindings used for Pages Functions.

kv_namespaces.description: KV namespaces used for Pages Functions.

mtls_certificates.description: mTLS bindings used for Pages Functions.

placement.description: Placement setting used for Pages Functions.

queue_producers.description: Queue Producer bindings used for Pages Functions.

r2_buckets.description: R2 buckets used for Pages Functions.

usage_model.description: The usage model for Pages Functions.
usage_model.x-stainless-deprecation-message: All new projects now use the Standard usage model.

vectorize_bindings.description: Vectorize bindings used for Pages Functions.

wrangler_config_hash.description: Hash of the Wrangler configuration used for the deployment.
